name: A Spooky Teaparty
description:
Have you ever wondered what happens when suddenly a regular, boring tea party teleports your adventuring group to a mysterious, mystifying castle full of bizarre characters? In the first place, everything there seems different, odd and yet… interestingly spooky!

Follow Rover, Summer, Britton and Marina, a previously rookie team, to a brand new exploration based, rpg adventure just after the events on Aplestia island! Lead them through the different dimensions of the spooky and mysterious Duruduru Castle and help them uncover the truth behind this bizarre place and escape back to the human world! Side quests, puzzles, mystic and secret rooms, monsters, items and apparel, Halloween treats, yucky snacks, and boss-summoning bubbling cauldrons are all waiting for you! Explore and emerge victorious!

Are you ready for this fantastic, magical Halloween adventure? Feeling curious about the large variety of spooky gear, mysterious items and dribbling potions?

Looney skeletons, wandering spirits, cursed vampires, treat-or-tricking cauldrons and much more are all there to enhance the amusingly spooky and refreshingly fun atmosphere of this adventure!


  • Fullscreen Mode through the options
  • Turn based battle system
  • FPS Synchronization option for newer monitors
  • Quick Combat!
  • Spookily pleasing areas with lots of treasure, loot and traps!
  • Over 17 side quests - trackable via the Quest Log
  • Difficulty option at the start of the game
  • Various item collections to complete
  • Funny dialogs and atmosphere
  • 9 secret rooms with visual cues
  • 4 Mythic Weapons for you to find
  • Visible, non respawning enemy encounters
  • Rich gameplay of 6+ hours depending on your exploration prowess and difficulty mode!
